Notification.ClanHelp.NoClan:
Available Commands:
[#ffd479]/{0} create <tag> "description"[/#] - Create a new clan
[#ffd479]/{0} accept <tag>[/#] - Join a clan by invitation
[#ffd479]/{0} reject <tag>[/#] - Reject a clan invitation
Notification.ClanHelp.Basic:
Available Commands:
[#ffd479]/{0}[/#] - Display your clan information
[#ffd479]/{1} <message>[/#] - Send a message via clan chat
[#ffd479]/{0} leave[/#] - Leave your current clan
Notification.ClanHelp.Alliance:
[#45b6fe]<size=14>Alliance Commands:</size>[/#]
[#ffd479]/{0} invite <tag>[/#] - Invite a clan to become allies
[#ffd479]/{0} withdraw <tag>[/#] - Withdraw an alliance invitation
[#ffd479]/{0} accept <tag>[/#] - Accept an alliance invitation
[#ffd479]/{0} reject <tag>[/#] - Reject an alliance invitation
[#ffd479]/{0} revoke <tag>[/#] - Revoke an alliance
Notification.ClanHelp.Moderator:
[#b573ff]<size=14>Moderator Commands:</size>[/#]
[#ffd479]/{0} invite <name or ID>[/#] - Invite a player to your clan
[#ffd479]/{0} withdraw <name or ID>[/#] - Revoke a invitation
[#ffd479]/{0} kick <name or ID>[/#] - Kick a member from your clan
Notification.ClanHelp.Owner:
[#a1ff46]<size=14>Owner Commands:</size>[/#]
[#ffd479]/{0} promote <name or ID>[/#] - Promote a clan member
[#ffd479]/{0} demote <name or ID>[/#] - Demote a clan member
[#ffd479]/{0} disband forever[/#] - Disband your clan
Notification.Clan.NotInAClan: You are currently not a member of a clan
Notification.Clan.InviteSyntax: [#ffd479]/{0} invite <partialNameOrID>[/#] - Invite a player to your clan
Notification.Clan.AcceptSyntax: [#ffd479]/{0} accept <tag>[/#] - Join a clan by invitation
Notification.Clan.PromoteSyntax: [#ffd479]/{0} promote <partialNameOrID>[/#] - Promote a clanFreb member to the next rank
Notification.Clan.DemoteSyntax: [#ffd479]/{0} demote <partialNameOrID>[/#] - Demote a clan member to the next lowest rank
Notification.Clan.DisbandSyntax: [#ffd479]/{0} disband forever[/#] - Disband your clan (this can not be undone)
Notification.Clan.KickSyntax: [#ffd479]/{0} kick <partialNameOrID>[/#] - Kick a member from your clan
Notification.Clan.TagColorSyntax: <color=#ffd479>/{0} tagcolor <hex (XXXXXX)></color> - Set a custom clan tag color
Notification.Clan.TagColorFormat: <color=#ffd479>The hex string must be 6 characters long, and be a valid hex color</color>
Notification.Clan.TagColorReset: <color=#ffd479>You have reset your clan's tag color</color>
Notification.Clan.TagColorSet: <color=#ffd479>You have set your clan's tag color to</color> <color=#{0}>{0}</color>
Notification.Clan.TagColorDisabled: <color=#ffd479>Custom tag colors are disabled on this server</color>
